message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this item. I think it's really valuable, so I'm starting the price at $230. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $230 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $230 is my ideal price, I could come down to $190. That's a significant reduction, and I believe it reflects the true value of the item.
I appreciate the reduction, but $190 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $100 for the product.
Bob, I see you're serious about this item.  Let's make this work - I'm willing to drop to $160, my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you at $140, that's my final offer.
